titleStmt.title: The morality of the seventh-day-Sabbath disproved in answer to C.T. Tillam's book, entituled, A present from prison, dedicated to L.C. Hobson ... / written by the learned J.B., Master of arts, at the request of the said L.C. Hobson.
titleStmt.author: J. B.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Francis Clark for L. Curtis,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
